00001 import wx
00002 import wx.lib.stattext
00003 from gui import feedbackpanel
00004 
00005 class IndividualPanel(feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel):
00006 
00007     def __init__(self, parent, id, widget_style, grid, ui_data, size = None):
00008         #feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel.__init__(self, parent, id, size = (300, 200))
00009         feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel.__init__(self, parent, id)
00010 
00011         gridSize = [10,2]
00012         
00013         widgets = {}
00014         widgets['label'] = wx.lib.stattext.GenStaticText
00015         widgets['slider'] = wx.Slider
00016         widgets['button'] = wx.Button
00017         widgets['textbox'] = wx.TextCtrl
00018         widgets['combobox'] = wx.Choice
00019         self.widgets = widgets
00020 
00021         #self.SetBackgroundColour(tuple(widget_style[0]))
00022         self.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[0])
00023 
00024         sizer = wx.GridSizer(gridSize[0], gridSize[1], 2, 2)
00025 
00026         wIndex = 1
00027         for j in xrange(gridSize[0]):
00028             for k in xrange(gridSize[1]):
00029                 if grid[j*gridSize[1] + k] > 0:
00030                     _widget = self.addWidget(ui_data[grid[j*gridSize[1]+k]])
00031                     # set bg color
00032                     _widget.SetBackgroundColour(widget_style[wIndex])
00033                     wIndex += 1
00034                     sizer.Add(_widget, 1, border = 5, flag=wx.EXPAND)
00035 
00036                 else:
00037                     sizer.Add((20, 5))
00038 
00039 
00040         sizer.Layout()
00041         self.sizer.Add(sizer)
00042         self.Layout()
00043 
00044 #------------------------------------------#
00045     def addWidget(self, widget):
00046         _widget = None
00047         if widget['name'] == 'label':
00048             _widget = self.widgets['label'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00049 
00050         elif widget['name'] == 'textbox':
00051             _widget = self.widgets['textbox'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00052 
00053         elif widget['name'] == 'button':
00054             _widget = self.widgets['button'](self, -1, widget['value'])
00055 
00056         elif widget['name'] == 'slider':
00057             _widget = self.widgets['slider'](self, -1, size = widget['size'])
00058 
00059         elif widget['name'] == 'combobox':
00060             _widget = self.widgets['combobox'](self, -1, size = widget['size'], 
00061                     choices = eval(widget['value']))
00062 
00063         return _widget
00064
